title: Client hyperlinks aren't working
body:
Hello,
For a while now, I haven't been able to open links through the client (Match history, articles, etc.) and I'm just wondering if anyone else has this problem or has a fix for it.

Thanks

**Notes**
I am on windows 8
Chrome is my default browser

replies.body:
Have you tried changing your default browser? Even if you just switch from Chrome and then back to it the next time you open it.

Also, are you doing this from the control panel or something else?

When I change my default browser to internet explorer it works fine, but then, it's internet explorer and there's no way I'm going to use that.
Also, links to in-client things work fine, like store sales.

So how exactly are you changing your default browser? Are you clicking "Yes, make this my default browser," upon opening a browser when it's not already your default browser or are you going into the control panel and doing it yourself?
I was going through control panel, but that's got nothing to do with it as far as I can tell, it's something to do with chrome I believe.

I'd like some clarity.

When you set Internet Explorer to be your default browser, do the links from League work?

Have you tried looking through the configuration you have for Chrome to see how it deals with links presented to it from the bus?

I don't use Chrome myself so I can't really help you with the specifics. You might want to head over to Chrome's forums/support page.

I'm not sure what the setting was, but after uninstalling and re-installing the links seem to have fixed.
Thanks a lot for trying to help

>Thanks a lot for trying

ay it's the spirit that counts.

Best of luck for the future.
It doesn't feel right doing this but, bump. (Sorry)

>bump

kek get yo ass back to the forums, it doesn't work here (well, kinda if you want to get technical, but not really)
